newsitem.title: USA: McAfee sees Q3 EPS $0.36 excluding charge.
newsitem.headline: McAfee sees Q3 EPS $0.36 excluding charge.

text.p: McAfee Associates Inc said on Tuesday it expects third quarter revenues of about $47 million and earnings per share of $0.36, excluding acquisition-related charges.
The company, which sells network security and management software for PC networks, said it will release complete third quarter results after the close of market on October 21.
"We're pleased with preliminary third quarter results," said Bill Larson, McAfee president, chairman, and chief executive said in a statement.

"Although the third quarter is typically a soft quarter for most software vendors, we experienced accelerating growth across our family of network security and management solutions. Our balance sheet continued to be strong, with over $110 million in cash," he said.
